channel.description: Recent content in Doan Xuan Bach on Hugo Story

item.title: Projects
item.description:
My Projects

Below are some of my academic and personal projects.

1. Car Dealership System

Description:
A multi-layer Java application for managing car sales, customers and test drives.

Technologies:

  • Java
  • Gradle
  • PostgreSQL
  • JUnit

Features:

  • Add and manage cars
  • Register customers
  • Schedule test drives
  • Data validation and business logic separation

GitHub: https://github.com/DoanXuanBach/your-repo

2. Linux Administration Lab

Description:
A set of Bash scripts for system monitoring and log analysis.

Technologies:

  • Bash
  • Linux CLI
  • grep, sed, awk

Tasks implemented:
